hero.name: WWT
hero.description: Sharing AI Coding, AI video production tips, and professional filmmaking experience. From code to visuals, explore the infinite possibilities of the AI era.

home.categories_subtitle: Dive into different areas and find what interests you
home.cat_ai_coding_desc: Accelerate your development workflow with AI tools, master prompt engineering and automation
home.cat_ai_video_desc: From script generation to post-production VFX, discover how AI revolutionizes video creation
home.cat_tools_desc: Curated AI and development tools to boost your productivity
home.cat_works_desc: Brand ads, commercial videos, event coverage and professional video production showcases
home.cta_description: Join Premium for advanced tutorials, source file downloads, and one-on-one consultation opportunities.

premium.title: Join Us
premium.subtitle: Unlock exclusive AI tutorials and resources

faq.a: Premium members get full access to advanced tutorials, source code & prompt template downloads, and 1-on-1 consultation opportunities.
Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time with no additional charges.
We offer plenty of free content for you to try first. Upgrade to Premium when you're ready.

footer.description: AI-Powered Creative Workshop — Sharing AI Coding, video production tips & professional filmmaking experience.

admin.homepage_description: Edit hero, category cards and CTA section. Leave empty to use default text.
admin.appearance_description: Set site accent color, logo URL and site name. Changes apply to the front-end.
admin.appearance_site_name_placeholder: Used as Logo alt text. Leave empty for default
admin.appearance_bg_image_placeholder: Enter image URL. Leave empty for default
admin.settings_description: Set site name, description, etc. Used in page title and footer.
admin.settings_site_title_placeholder: Used in browser title, footer. Leave empty for default
admin.settings_site_description_placeholder: Short description in footer. Leave empty for default
admin.menu_description: Manage the site header navigation: edit names, paths, order, or hide, delete, and add items.
admin.menu_is_parent_hint: When checked, this item has no link; hover only to show dropdown
